name: Minted Bulgur With Peas
keywords: coarse bulgur, peas, plain yogurt, high fiber, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 cup shelled fresh peas or frozen peas
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cover bulgur with hot water and allow to stand for 30 minutes. Drain thoroughly, squeezing out additional water with hands.
Cook the fresh peas in boiling water for 1 minute and drain. Or defrost frozen peas but do not cook.
Combine peas with bulgur and remaining ingredients except for yogurt. Then stir in yogurt to coat thoroughly.
